operations.CreateAnalyzer: Creates an analyzer with a zone of trust set to your account.
operations.CreateArchiveRule: Creates an archive rule for the specified analyzer.
operations.DeleteAnalyzer: Deletes the specified analyzer. When you delete an analyzer, Access Analyzer is disabled for the account in the current or specific Region. All findings that were generated by the analyzer are deleted. You cannot undo this action.
operations.ListAnalyzedResources: Retrieves a list of resources that have been analyzed.
operations.ListArchiveRules: Retrieves a list of archive rules created for the specified analyzer.
operations.ListFindings: Retrieves a list of findings generated by the specified analyzer.
operations.ListTagsForResource: Retrieves a list of tags applied to the specified resource.
operations.StartResourceScan: Starts a scan of the policies applied to the specified resource.
operations.TagResource: Adds a tag to the specified resource.
operations.UntagResource: Removes a tag from the specified resource.
operations.UpdateFindings: Updates findings with the new values provided in the request.

AccessDeniedException.base: You do not have sufficient access to perform this action.

refs.AnalyzedResource$actions: The actions that an external principal is granted permission to use by the policy that generated the finding.
refs.Finding$action: The action in the analyzed policy statement that an external principal has permission to use.
refs.FindingSummary$action: The action in the analyzed policy statement that an external principal has permission to use.

refs.GetAnalyzedResourceResponse$resource: An AnalyedResource object that contains information that Access Analyzer found when it analyzed the resource.

AnalyzedResourceSummary.base: Contains the ARN of the analyzed resource.

refs.ListAnalyzedResourcesResponse$analyzedRe: A list of resources that were analyzed.

refs.CreateAnalyzerResponse$arn: The ARN of the analyzer that was created by the request.
refs.GetAnalyzedResourceRequest$analyzerArn: The ARN of the analyzer to retrieve information from.
refs.GetFindingRequest$analyzerArn: The ARN of the analyzer that generated the finding.
refs.ListAnalyzedResourcesRequest$analyzerArn: The ARN of the analyzer to retrieve a list of analyzed resources from.
refs.ListFindingsRequest$analyzerArn: The ARN of the analyzer to retrieve findings from.
refs.StartResourceScanRequest$analyzerArn: The ARN of the analyzer to use to scan the policies applied to the specified resource.
refs.UpdateFindingsRequest$analyzerArn: The ARN of the analyzer that generated the findings to update.

refs.GetAnalyzerResponse$analyzer: An AnalyzerSummary object that contains information about the analyzer.

refs.ListArchiveRulesResponse$archiveRules: A list of archive rules created for the specified analyzer.

refs.AnalyzedResource$isPublic: Indicates whether the policy that generated the finding grants public access to the resource.
refs.Criterion$exists: An "exists" operator to match for the filter used to create the rule.
refs.Finding$isPublic: Indicates whether the policy that generated the finding allows public access to the resource.
refs.FindingSummary$isPublic: Indicates whether the finding reports a resource that has a policy that allows public access.

refs.Finding$condition: The condition in the analyzed policy statement that resulted in a finding.
refs.FindingSummary$condition: The condition in the analyzed policy statement that resulted in a finding.

CreateAnalyzerResponse.base: The response to the request to create an analyzer.

Criterion.base: The criteria to use in the filter that defines the rule.

refs.ArchiveRuleSummary$filter: A filter used to define the archive rule.
refs.ListFindingsRequest$filter: A filter to match for the findings to return.
refs.UpdateArchiveRuleRequest$filter: A filter to match for the rules to update. Only rules that match the filter are updated.

refs.GetFindingRequest$id: The ID of the finding to retrieve.

refs.UpdateFindingsRequest$ids: The IDs of the findings to update.

refs.AnalyzedResource$status: The current status of the finding generated from the analyzed resource.

refs.UpdateFindingsRequest$status: The state represents the action to take to update the finding Status. Use ARCHIVE to change an Active finding to an Archived finding. Use ACTIVE to change an Archived finding to an Active finding.

refs.ListFindingsResponse$findings: A list of findings retrieved from the analyzer that match the filter criteria specified, if any.

refs.CreateAnalyzerRequest$archiveRules: Specifies the archive rules to add for the analyzer.

refs.ListAnalyzedResourcesRequest$maxResults: The maximum number of results to return in the response.
refs.ListAnalyzersRequest$maxResults: The maximum number of results to return in the response.
refs.ListArchiveRulesRequest$maxResults: The maximum number of results to return in the request.
refs.ListFindingsRequest$maxResults: The maximum number of results to return in the response.

ListAnalyzedResourcesRequest.base: Retrieves a list of resources that have been analyzed.

ListArchiveRulesRequest.base: Retrieves a list of archive rules created for the specified analyzer.

ListFindingsRequest.base: Retrieves a list of findings generated by the specified analyzer.

ListTagsForResourceRequest.base: Retrieves a list of tags applied to the specified resource.

refs.CreateAnalyzerRequest$analyzerName: The name of the analyzer to create.
refs.CreateArchiveRuleRequest$ruleName: The name of the rule to create.
refs.DeleteAnalyzerRequest$analyzerName: The name of the analyzer to delete.
refs.DeleteArchiveRuleRequest$analyzerName: The name of the analyzer that was deleted.
refs.DeleteArchiveRuleRequest$ruleName: The name of the rule to delete.
refs.GetArchiveRuleRequest$analyzerName: The name of the analyzer to retrieve rules from.
refs.GetArchiveRuleRequest$ruleName: The name of the rule to retrieve.
refs.ListArchiveRulesRequest$analyzerName: The name of the analyzer to retrieve rules from.
refs.UpdateArchiveRuleRequest$analyzerName: The name of the analyzer to update the archive rules for.
refs.UpdateArchiveRuleRequest$ruleName: The name of the rule to update.

refs.Finding$principal: The external principal that access to a resource within the zone of trust.
refs.FindingSummary$principal: The external principal that has access to a resource within the zone of trust.

refs.AnalyzedResource$resourceArn: The ARN of the resource that was analyzed.
refs.GetAnalyzedResourceRequest$resourceArn: The ARN of the resource to retrieve information about.
refs.StartResourceScanRequest$resourceArn: The ARN of the resource to scan.
refs.UpdateFindingsRequest$resourceArn: The ARN of the resource identified in the finding.

ResourceNotFoundException.base: The specified resource could not be found.

refs.AnalyzedResource$resourceType: The type of the resource that was analyzed.
refs.AnalyzedResourceSummary$resourceType: The type of resource that was analyzed.
refs.Finding$resourceType: The type of the resource reported in the finding.
refs.FindingSummary$resourceType: The type of the resource that the external principal has access to.

refs.AnalyzedResource$sharedVia: Indicates how the access that generated the finding is granted.

refs.ListFindingsRequest$sort: The sort order for the findings returned.

StartResourceScanRequest.base: Starts a scan of the policies applied to the specified resource.

refs.AnalyzerSummary$lastResourceAnalyzed: The resource that was most recently analyzed by the analyzer.
refs.Finding$resource: The resource that an external principal has access to.
refs.FindingSummary$error: The error that resulted in an Error finding.
refs.FindingSummary$resource: The resource that the external principal has access to.
refs.ListTagsForResourceRequest$resourceArn: The ARN of the resource to retrieve tags from.
refs.SortCriteria$attributeName: The name of the attribute to sort on.
refs.TagResourceRequest$resourceArn: The ARN of the resource to add the tag to.
refs.UntagResourceRequest$resourceArn: The ARN of the resource to remove the tag from.

refs.UntagResourceRequest$tagKeys: The key for the tag to add.

TagResourceRequest.base: Adds a tag to the specified resource.

refs.CreateAnalyzerRequest$tags: The tags to apply to the analyzer.
refs.ListTagsForResourceResponse$tags: The tags that are applied to the specified resource.
refs.TagResourceRequest$tags: The tags to add to the resource.

refs.AnalyzedResource$analyzedAt: The time at which the resource was analyzed.
refs.AnalyzedResource$createdAt: The time at which the finding was created.
refs.AnalyzedResource$updatedAt: The time at which the finding was updated.
refs.AnalyzerSummary$createdAt: A timestamp for the time at which the analyzer was created.
refs.AnalyzerSummary$lastResourceAnalyzedAt: The time at which the most recently analyzed resource was analyzed.
refs.ArchiveRuleSummary$createdAt: The time at which the archive rule was created.
refs.ArchiveRuleSummary$updatedAt: The time at which the archive rule was last updated.
refs.Finding$analyzedAt: The time at which the resource was analyzed.
refs.Finding$createdAt: The time at which the finding was generated.
refs.Finding$updatedAt: The time at which the finding was updated.
refs.FindingSummary$analyzedAt: The time at which the resource-based policy that generated the finding was analyzed.
refs.FindingSummary$createdAt: The time at which the finding was created.
refs.FindingSummary$updatedAt: The time at which the finding was most recently updated.

refs.ListAnalyzedResourcesRequest$nextToken: A token used for pagination of results returned.
refs.ListAnalyzedResourcesResponse$nextToken: A token used for pagination of results returned.
refs.ListAnalyzersRequest$nextToken: A token used for pagination of results returned.
refs.ListAnalyzersResponse$nextToken: A token used for pagination of results returned.
refs.ListArchiveRulesRequest$nextToken: A token used for pagination of results returned.
refs.ListArchiveRulesResponse$nextToken: A token used for pagination of results returned.
refs.ListFindingsRequest$nextToken: A token used for pagination of results returned.
refs.ListFindingsResponse$nextToken: A token used for pagination of results returned.

refs.AnalyzerSummary$type: The type of analyzer, which corresponds to the zone of trust chosen for the analyzer.
refs.CreateAnalyzerRequest$type: The zone of trust for the analyzer. You can create only one analyzer per account per Region.
refs.ListAnalyzersRequest$type: The type of analyzer, which corresponds to the zone of trust selected when the analyzer was created.

UntagResourceRequest.base: Removes a tag from the specified resource.

UpdateFindingsRequest.base: Updates findings with the new values provided in the request.

refs.ValidationException$fieldList: A list of fields that didn't validate.

refs.Criterion$contains: A "contains" operator to match for the filter used to create the rule.
refs.Criterion$eq: An "equals" operator to match for the filter used to create the rule.
refs.Criterion$neq: A "not equals" operator to match for the filter used to create the rule.
